meanings.definition: A type of fishing lure that creates a buzzing noise to attract fish.
meanings.sent1: The fisherman used a buzzbait to catch a big bass.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new buzzbait for my fishing trip this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The buzzbait was so loud that even the fish could hear it!
meanings.sent4: The buzzbait danced on the water's surface like a tiny buzzing insect.
meanings.sent5: The metallic buzzbait shimmered in the sunlight, calling out to the fish below.

meanings.definition: To use a buzzbait while fishing.
meanings.sent1: He decided to buzzbait in the calm lake to attract the fish.
meanings.sent2: She loves to buzzbait early in the morning when the fish are most active.
meanings.sent3: The fisherman buzzbaited with such enthusiasm that he scared away all the fish!
meanings.sent4: As he buzzbaited, it felt like he was conducting a symphony for the underwater creatures.
meanings.sent5: Buzzbaiting requires patience and skill to lure the fish effectively.
